title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: For a while I have been away, just taking a break though. So my country people, how una side and how the harmattan of our economy they blow for una side. As the country be na everyday things dey dey hard, money no reach to buy things anymore, how person go come invest for this harsh time. If e happen say , everywhere red for you, you fit chuck hand for your investment take save your self from the current economy situation even when you know say, Bitcoin halving dey for one corner

comments.author: Amphenomenon
comments.body: The economy is bad and will still get worse but the fact is that it doesn't mean you have to be taking your invested bitcoin. To avoid all this set up plan for your bitcoin investment, invest in a amount that you know will not affect your cost of living, you are investing not saving so if you continue to take what will now be left of your investment funds?

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: If you know get real need to dip hand inside your bitcoin investment e better make you leave am because this coming halving be like say e go really dey bullish with how things dey go for global economy. The wars wey dey go on don cause inflation to dey increase and that one don dey make more people dey carry fiat take hedge in btc, so e go make more value for btc. But if person get health issues and other serious challenge wey him go carry the money from bitcoin take solve then it should be done afterall na your money and na person wey dey alive dey invest.

Then when we dey talk about Bitcoin for this kind of economy, our baba dem dey always advise say Bitcoin no be do or die affairs, if you no fit meet up again abeg just try make you take care of yourself because na who dey alive na im dey invest for Bitcoin, you fit just stop for the main time until you balance again. If not na wattin be the profit to dey rush rush when if hunger hook you well na still your coins you go sell with drop by transact fee or withdrawal process. Person wey say e no go chuk hand put for em investment when everywhere red, make you just know say that person get backup wey e go return to.But before this time e for good make person get small savings for fiat because of all this kind of things, and person wey like to enter bitcoin holding make e make sure e get work wey dey pay, if not na front and back that Lind person go dey go, Bitcoin was created for all but no be everybody go fit put body do am.

No one can predict bitcoin so if you invest now and the price drops dramatically, you won't be able to be patient and leave it for the long term because you don't have enough money.You see how the economy dey now just go find work do or any business where you fit do and survive because we don't know when this hardships go stop now we just need to work hard and stop complaining because na our leaders dey make things hard for the youth, every 8 years new government comes site something most change buhari turn president things hard foodstuffs just add price nothing come down, He close border say make we dey do things buy our self make we no buy any product from outside, now Tinubu turn president he just remove subsidy for fuel everything just increase price fuel where we dey buy 160 litres done reach 623# each litres now anything you on go buy if the price to high and you complain dey go talk say fuel done cost.So my bro, how this thing dey happen for naija you think say he go stop now if this our leaders fight for solution but dey don't know go do because na them dey cause am corruption done full everywhere because na every year things dey happen you go just dey see different things just pray and look for something doing that you make you survive and be getting small money because we don't no when this hardships go stop we just dey pray make the thing stop soon and make the country good for us, Just go find anything to do and forget about this issue for naija all these big peoples where you see dey don't no waiting dey sub because dey get money even whatever cost dey go purchase am because money know be their problem so my bro just leave this wahala and hustle that all and you go enjoy.

Right now even getting cash gifts from people seems like a huge task cos of the economic situation. The solution is not saving cos a time will come when these savings would be needed. It's not even just mere earning, a random or low earning will still mean struggling through survival, do your best to earn big so the struggle will be less.Â Invest in productive businesses is also a good idea but be cautious of the investment, and do not use all the savings. Everyone is in a haste to make meaning out of life even in this hard situation, so the whole process is getting tough and challenging but one just has to scale through. It's not our fault, it's evident that our corrupt, greedy and self centered leaders are just not ready to help change the system and status of the economy but what can we actually do.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: OP, welcome back from your time off, we need to understand that as Nigerians, the suffering is everywhere just those in power and the influential people don't feel it much, they only feel it when they buy petroleum products which they use lesser amount of money to purchase before or payment of flight ticket, but as an ordinary citizen, we feel it in all aspect, you talk about one withdrawing investment to help him or herself, op, you have forgotten so quick that, it is not everyone that's here that have an investment in either bitcoin or in other things, some people barely have mobile data to even browse the internet, the case of hardship in Nigeria has taken another shape, if someone has an investment it is good to withdraw a little to solve some issues,thats if there is know alternative, but on general note having an extra hustle aside your investment is good, that's if you can lay hand on one.
